document.full_text: tim pawlenty, the former governor of minnesota, is set to declare that he is opening a presidential exploratory committee, a step that formalizes a campaign for the republican nomination that he has been pondering for more than a year.
document.title: pawlenty takes step toward 2012 run
lines_and_colors: tim pawlenty, the former governor of minnesota, is set to declare that he is opening a presidential exploratory committee, a step that formalizes a campaign for the republican nomination that he has been pondering for more than a year.
